Hey, torrent works beautifully, works on both snow leopard ( original 13 inch macbook alum ), as well as lion ( brand new 27 inch imac). only question i have, is where is the save file located? 

and for those having issues, heres what i did to get it to work. Open it with toast, then copy the ENTIRE folder into your applications, take out and remove the old program file, not the data one, unzip and insert the new one. and it works great

ok, I had problems with mounting the .toast file, what happened was osx claiming that there was a "checksum"error, well, the ONLY way out of this is actually onpening it with toast titanium. the link is in the comments, after downloading and installing, all there is to do is open it and, through finder, control-click and open (file) with toast, it will then ask you to mount it. just do it and there you go, move it to your applications folder and replace the patch taht came with the torrent.
